Rachel was a 18 year old senior girl that was the track star of her school. She had long, brown hair put into a ponytail with blue eyes and dimples. She was a petite girl with an athletic body with small feet. She had a friendly and energetic personality that had a very ticklish stomach and feet.

1553322222222222222222221.title: Rachel and Skylar

15533222222222222222222211.content:
Rachel and Skylar's Situation: Both girls got home from school and Rachel goes for a run to stay in shape for track, while Skylar relaxes in the living room and watches TV until she gets back.

Frank and Carl's Situation: These two creeps were stalkers of Rachel over the past year after her dad fired them as employees and they wanted to take revenge. These men were fired by Rachel's dad because they started a "Tickle Fetish Club" after hours in his office building. They were both janitors and would let the other members of the club in the building to participate in tickle torture of employees or other girls they managed to bribe, trick or force to come.

"Right on schedule" Frank stated looking out the window of his van while watching Rachel walk out of her house and go for a run. "We have about 30 minutes until she gets back" Carl stated while sitting in the passenger's seat of the van. "We need to wait 10 more minutes and then we can go through with our plan" Frank replied back. "I hope she falls for it" Carl said with some hesitation. "Don't worry, we have a full proof plan, nothing can go wrong" Frank reassured Carl.

What was their plan?
15533222222222222222222211.title: Home

choices: Tied up in the backseat of a van
155332222222222222222222111.content:
Carl and Frank put on their disguises as deliverymen and pulled their van into Rachel's driveway, just stopping after the sidewalk. They got out of the car and headed to the front door with a very large and heavy package.

*Ding Dong* Frank pressed the doorbell and after a couple rings, the front door opened and the men were greeted by Skylar.

Both men froze in silence when Skylar opened the door revealing her body. "Hello! Can I help you??" She exclaimed to get them out of a trans like state of starring at her skimpy outfit (a super small crop top and jean shorts that revealed her very long and beautiful legs).

They snapped out of the daze and asked "Hi miss, we have a package to deliver to this house and need you to sign for it" Frank stated. She did not think much of it and agreed to sign off on the delivery; however, when she tried to lift the package and bring it inside, she was unable to lift it. "Umm this is too heavy" Skylar stated while trying a couple more times to lift the box.

"Let us help you, where do you want it placed" Frank asked the teen. "Umm just inside the door is fine" she replied while allowing both men to step foot inside and drop the package in the hallway.

Once them men dropped the package, Frank brandished a clip board and pen for Skylar to sign off on the delivery "I just need you to sign here" he told the girl. When Skylar reached for the pen, Frank purposely dropped it but made it look like an accident "Opps my bad let me get that" he said but Skylar insisted she can pick it up and bent over and grabbed the pen off of the ground. In the several seconds she was distracted, Carl moved behind Skylar and when she stood up after picking up the pen, he reached around and placed a white cloth forcefully over her mouth.

"Mppph!" Skylar squealed out while inhaling the fumes of whatever was poured onto the cloth. "Mpph! Mpph!" More grunts of protest came from Slylar while she attempted to pry the hand of Carl off of her mouth but she was not strong enough and slowly fell unconscious while putting up a weak struggle. Her eyes slowly rolled shut and her body fell limp into the arms of Carl.

"Ok lets hurry up and get her outside" Frank stated, the two men carried the unconscious girl outside and placed her in the yard just feet away from their van. Carl stayed with Skylar while Frank hid behind the front of the van out of sight from when Rachel would come back from her run.

After several more minutes, Rachel was coming back from her run when she noticed a stranger pacing back and forth in her yard and when she approached closer, saw Skylar on the ground unconscious. "Ok thank God, we were driving by and noticed this girl passed out in the yard, do you live here?" Carl stated in a frantic tone of voice. "Oh my God, Skylar are you ok??" Rachel immediately ran over and knelt down next to Skylar. "Dont worry we already called 911 they are on the way" Carl reassured Rachel.

While Carl was trying to keep Rachel calm, Frank snuck up slowly behind Rachel but accidentally tripped and fell onto the ground. Rachel turned around when she heard the noise of another man falling and hitting the ground. "What the heck?" Rachel asked in confusion noticing a roll of duct tape fall out of Frank's back pocket and a white cloth laying on the floor.

Rachel started to figure out the ill intentions of these men and tried to get up and run away but was immediately tackled to the ground by Carl. They had a quick wrestle match that didn't go well for the tiny teen and she was soon pinned down with Carl sitting on top of her with her arms pinned underneath his legs.

There wasn't anything Rachel could do but try to scream but as soon as she yelled for help she was met with the cloth pressed firmly against her mouth "Hellmpph!" She shouted until she was unable to scream. Her head moved left and right trying to get the cloth from off of her mouth but with her arms pinned down, she only could grunt in protest underneath the cloth. Her legs kicked and squirmed for quite awhile, Rachel was fairly resilient to the chloroform but eventually her legs slowly stopped fighting back, her eyes rolled back and her head fell to her right side. When Carl removed the cloth, Rachel's mouth was partially open and she laid motionless, signaling she was fully passed out.

When Rachel woke up, she would find herself.....

1553322222222222222222221111.content:
Rachel's eyes started to flicker open and slowly she would regain consciousness. When she was fully awake, she realized she was tied up on a bed with her head facing down, her arms were behind her back tied together at the wrists with a ziptie and her legs tied together just above the knees and ankles what felt to be duct tape. She tried to let out a scream for help and was muffled by the piece of tape slapped over her mouth. She could hear alot of laughter, screams and excitement coming from the other room, she was scared but couldn't move from her predicament.

"Don't worry sweetheart, your friend seems to be the center of attention tonight" a voice chimed in from the bed. Rachel tried to look behind her and realized it was the very large and muscular man that pinned her down. He was in a seated position with his back against the headboard of the bed and his legs spread to each side of her body. Her head was towards the end of the bed with her body inside of his legs and her ankles and feet rested on top of his belly.

"My name is Carl my dear and we are going to get to know one another tonight" he gazed upon Rachel, she was wearing a tight and small pair of running shorts and a sports bra, which exposed alot of her athletic body.

Carl grabbed her feet with a painful grip and yanked then towards his face, causing her whole body to creep forward. "Most guys would be lucky just to be in the same room with you, but here I am getting to break you in and" he stated while methodically taking off her running shoes and socks on both feet and tossing them onto the floor of the bedroom.

He dragged her struggling feet towards his face, studying them. They were tiny and perfect. Smooth and soft pink and white soles, with adorable toes and glossy nails. He raised his spare hand over one helpless squirming sole. Rachel was trying to writhe away from the bed, but his grip around her thin ankles was too strong. He was inches from her helpless, captive soles.

He started slow, he dragged all five nails down her sole, starting at her toes and down her heel. Her feet felt like heaven in his hand, and he felt momentarily high from the feeling of power and control. Rachel was totally his, and a single finger on her sole showed it. He used five. The teenager jerked and yelped and whimpered; fighting with strength she didn't even know she had. He had to steady himself and readjust his grip at her rebellion, but with pleasure in the act. "That was a single rake of my nails," he said, finally pulling the slow drag past her heel. "You know how much more of that I'm going to do" he replied in excitement.

Next, he dragged a single nail over her toes, from the big to the small. He was delighted as she jerked and yelped with each new contact, curling and flexing her feet in a desperate, doomed effort to protect her toes. "I had no idea feet could be so soft," he said. She tried to beg, but nothing made it through the tape but soft whimpering. He smiled at the sound.

He began to spider his fingers across Rachel's teenage soles, meanwhile, she was shocked at the overpowering ticklish sensation racing up across her body. She was ticklish, but the feelings were so powerful that anything over a few seconds became a literal torture for her. She began to whimper between her muffled giggles of laughter.

"No!" she attempted to cry, but through the gag only a muted "Mph!" emerged. The man grinned, and again released a wave of torture on her feet. The teen bucked and whined, and he loved having such power over someone so young and so beautiful. She was wholly and completely his, to feed his darkest and wildest dreams. And, judging from her squirming, sensitive as well. A dark vision of those cute little toes, locked in a vice while the girl begs for mercy.

Rachel shook her head no frantically knowing that her most ticklish area was her stomach and upperbody. Carl's hands wrapped around her sides and his fingers rested onto her belly ready to pounce.

"Oh maybe not...." Carl said while taking his hands off of her body. Rachel let out a quick sigh of relief. "Just kidding!" Carl stated while placing his hands back onto Rachel's sides and squeezed hard. She immediately erupted in laughter. "Mmmmhahahahmmmmhahaha" from the tape covering her mouth but the muffled laughing could still be heard.

Carl continued with letting go and squeezing her sides as fast and hard as he could. His squeeze caused Rachel to burst in laughter, her hips thrusted up causing her butt to lift up off of Carl's lap and then back down. Her legs kicked and flailed while her tied up arms inadvertently kept running up against his groin.

Sborts of laughter started coming from Rachel the more Carl kept squeezing her sides. Her body slowly slipped down his body trying to get away from his hands, each time he had to pull her back up and readjust his tickling. After several times of trying to keep her in position, he wrapped his left arm across her chest to make sure she did not slip anymore.

With his left hand keeping her body pinned in place, Carl switched up his tickling and attacked her belly with his right hand. Rachel threw an even bigger laughing fit, her muffled laughter was squealing at a higher pitch and more often his fingers races across her stomach. "Looks like I found the spot!" Carl said excitedly while spider tickling Rachel's belly mercilessly.

Rachel's legs kicked and flailed at a faster rate the more he tickled her belly, it was an unimaginable type of torture for her, she was squealing and luaghing so hard under the tape, her face started to turn beet red from running out of oxygen. "I thought a sports star like you would have more endurance!" Carl said while he kept up the tickling.

What felt like an eternity, Rachel endured over 15 minutes of tickle torture before Carl decided to give her a break. When he stopped, Rachel's hair was a mess, it covered up her face and stuck to her head; it looked a little damp from the sweat that built up on her body from the excitement. Her stomach was dripping with sweat, beads coming down and racing across her belly down to her shorts.

Carl ripped the piece of tape off of her mouth to allow Rachel to breathe. She let out a big gasp of air, her chest heaving up and down quickly trying to recuperate. The rest of her body laid limp while Carl laid her across the bed flat and then sat on top of her, just above her knees.

With Carl sitting on top of Rachel's thighs, he gazed upon the exhausted beauty some more. "Oh boy don't mind him, he got too excited" looking down at his pole pitching a tent under his pants. "Looks like your time is up, ready for round 2" Carl stated while leaning over to start blowing raspberries on Rachel's belly......
1553322222222222222222221111211.title: Some more tickling

choices: Rachel's phone on the nightstand started ringing
15533222222222222222222211112111.content:
Carl leaned over and blew the first raspberry onto Rachel's stomach, causing her to burst into laughter "Hahahaha" she let out a cute, playful giggle while her back arched off the bed in reaction. The second raspberry he blew right into her belly button, his tongue poked around which made Rachel giggle louder. Her belly was extremely sensitive, making it easy for Carl's raspberries getting her to laugh and squirm. 3,4,5 more raspberries were blown on Rachel's sensitive belly.

6,7,8 raspberries later, Rachel still playfully giggled each time she felt his mouth blow onto her belly. She didn't like the idea of Carl doing this but the giggling was involuntary. Her body couldn't control the laughing and it wasn't as torturous as squeezing her sides or spider tickling her belly, but nonetheless was an effective way for Rachel to laugh.

Over a dozen raspberries landed on Rachel's belly before his infatuation with her took over and he switched to sucking on her soft skin, causing a hickey to be placed just above her belly button. Rache was repulsed by this, it was disgusting but there was nothing she could do while he smacked several more hickies onto her belly, his last one was on the lowest part of her belly, just above the waistband of her shorts when he was interrupted by...
